name: TCP
description: Data transfer over TCP/IP and TLS stream sockets.

contents.name: open
contents.description: Open pair of pipes between network peripheral and a controlling device. In/outbound refers to direction from/to internet.

contents.name: open
contents.description: Open pair of pipes between network peripheral and a controlling device. In/outbound refers to direction from/to internet.

contents.name: open_ssl
contents.description:
Open an SSL connection to a given host:port pair. Can be issued only once on given pipe.
After the connection is established, an empty data report is sent.
Connection is closed by closing the pipe.

contents.name: outdata
contents.description: Bytes to be sent directly over an established TCP or SSL connection.

contents.name: indata
contents.description: Bytes read directly from directly over an established TCP or SSL connection.

contents.name: error
contents.description: Reported when an error is encountered. Negative error codes come directly from the SSL implementation.
